rules.description: Map cmd+q to F17 in neovide
Map cmd+space to shift+space
Map shift+space to F7+shift+space when Chinese input
Map escape to ctrl+shift+c in Xcode
Map Shift+J to three consecutive Js
Map Shift+K to three consecutive ks
Set space_pressed to 1 when spacebar is pressed in vim_mode
Map J to Control+O when space_pressed is 1 in xcode
Map r to caller when space_pressed is 1 in xcode
Map k to forward when space_pressed is 1 in xcode
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Set vim_mode to true for specific keys and false for escape
Map control+Space to dot
Map cmd+m to m
Map ctrl+u to cmd+backspace (except in terminal/neovide)
Map escape to cmd+escape in IDEs
Map escape to ctrl+7 in terminal/neovide
Map ctrl+j to cmd+down in QQ
Map ctrl+k to cmd+up in QQ
Map ctrl+hjkl to arrow keys
Map j to down arrow in MarginNote
Map shift+j to 5x down arrow in MarginNote
Map shift+k to 5x up arrow in MarginNote
Map shift+j to 5+j in Chrome/Arc
Map tab to right arrow in Chrome/Arc
Map shift+k to 5+k in Chrome/Arc
Map hjkl to arrow keys in MarginNote

manipulators.description: Map h to left arrow in MarginNote
Map l to right arrow in MarginNote

rules.description: Map Cmd + 1 to Cmd + S in Arc Browser
Map opt+tab to opt+j in Arc
Map cmd+e to ctrl+opt+cmd+p in Arc
Map cmd+= to ctrl+opt+cmd+m in Arc
Map mouse button4 to ctrl+o in IDEs
Map mouse button5 to ctrl+i in IDEs
Map ctrl+i to cmd+] in Arc
Map ctrl+o to cmd+[ in Arc
Map mouse button4 to cmd+[ in Arc
Map mouse button5 to cmd+] in Arc
Map cmd+- to ctrl+opt+cmd+M in Arc
Map F21 to shift (lazy) with F7 when alone (except terminal)
Map left shift to F7 when alone (except terminal/Chrome)
Map left cmd to F7 when alone
Map shift+caps_lock to shift+ctrl
Map cmd+caps_lock to cmd+ctrl
Map ctrl+enter to shift+enter (except Numbers/Neovide)
Map caps_lock to ctrl with ctrl+shift+3 when alone in Gemini
Map caps_lock to ctrl with escape+ctrl+c when alone in JetBrains IDEs
Map caps_lock to ctrl with escape when alone
Map cmd+enter to cmd+o in Finder
Map F21 to left shift
Map c-f to option+right (except Neovide)
Map c-b to option+left (except Neovide)
Map c-w to option+delete (except Neovide)
Map F21 to left shift (duplicate)
